WITH declare1 AS ( SELECT a.user_no, COUNT(*) cnt, COUNT(CASE b.CONFIRM_DECLARE_SITUATION WHEN 'N1' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) N1, COUNT(CASE b.CONFIRM_DECLARE_SITUATION WHEN 'N2' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) N2
FROM chall_confirm a JOIN chall_confirm_declare b ON a.confirm_no = b.confirm_no GROUP BY a.user_no ), sns_situation AS( select user_no, COUNT(CASE d.reply_SITUATION WHEN 'R1' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) R1, COUNT(CASE d.reply_SITUATION WHEN 'R2' THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) R2 from sns_declare d join sns f on d.feed_no = f.feed_no group by user_no ) SELECT a.user_no, use_Id, nickname, creaTeat, tell, get_codename(resp) AS resp, country, user_State, CONFIRM_CREATEAT, COALESCE(b.cnt, 0) AS cnt, -- NULL 대신 0으로 대체 COALESCE(b.N1, 0) AS N1, COALESCE(b.N2, 0) AS N2, R1, R2 FROM users a LEFT JOIN declare1 b ON a.user_no = b.user_no LEFT JOIN sns_situation e ON a.user_no = e.user_no ORDER BY a.user_no ASC
